name: Immigrate to Minas Gerais
description: Minas Gerais, Brazil's fourth largest state by area and second by population, is renowned for its colonial architecture in cities like Ouro Preto, mineral-rich history, diverse biomes including Cerrado and Atlantic Forest, and traditional cuisine featuring pão de queijo and cachaça.
keywords: Minas Gerais, Belo Horizonte, Ouro Preto, colonial architecture, pão de queijo, cachaça, football
